title: [Good Omens] Crowley Hates Pears
author: Kyokoon64
comment: Can we appreciate how wholesome this actually is? Like.... I'm legitimately imagining Crowley saying this to Aziraphael and somehow just having this underlining tone of love for his Angel~
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH YES mmmmmmmm the good shiiiiiiiiiiit Editing is amazing, GAYSON IS A LEGEND AND I LOVE THIS
description:
And now for something completely different. Art by gayson156 and editing by me. We saw the deleted clip from Doctor Who of the 'i hate pears' scene and we were like '... okay but Crowley from Good Omens though' and here we are
